long_description: Durable and leakproof, the 1-liter CamelBak Chute Water Bottle has an angled spout that provides a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling so you can stay hydrated while you're on the go. 100% BPA-free hard plastic stands up to frequent use around town and on backpacking trips. Spout cap snaps into the handle to prevent it from getting in the way when drinking; tether securely attaches the cap to the bottle for easy filling. Half-turn cap simplifies access to your water. The spout cap threads internally so there is no more drinking off those uncomfortable bottle threads. Take the cap off and the wide-mouth opening is easy to fill with ice. All parts of the CamelBak Chute Water Bottle are top-rack dishwasher safe.
short_description: Durable and leakproof, the 1-liter CamelBak Chute Water Bottle has an angled spout that provides a high flow of water without sloshing or spilling so you can stay hydrated while you're on the go.
